page.title: 14At Home Part 2
page.content: Every house has at least one{car}while many have two.Everyone uses their own car to travel to work probably because of an inadequate bus service which runs five times a day to the outskirts of{Dundee}where one has to transfer to another bus. As there are no shops in{ {Auchterhouse}most people do their food shopping in{Dundee}usually once a week, although{26%}shop more frequently and{8%}go for a big monthly shopping trip. There are six vans which serve the community although only{20%}use them. A{grocer's}van comes on{Wednesdays}and{Saturdays;}a {butcher's}on{Tuesdays}and{Fridays;}a {greengrocer's}and a{fish van}on{ {Thursdays.}On{Wednesdays}a{library van calls, while an{ice-cream van}tours the area every week-end selling {confectionery}as well as{ice-cream.}
